meanings.definition: Having a heart of iron; unfeeling or unyielding in nature.
meanings.sent1: The ironhearted soldier showed no emotion during battle.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her ironhearted determination to succeed.
meanings.sent3: The ironhearted robot refused to stop working, even when it was tired.
meanings.sent4: His ironhearted resolve to never give up inspired those around him.
meanings.sent5: The ironhearted mountain stood tall against the raging storm.

meanings.definition: Showing no compassion or mercy; cruel or harsh in behavior.
meanings.sent1: The ironhearted ruler punished anyone who disobeyed him.
meanings.sent2: Her ironhearted decision to fire employees shocked the staff.
meanings.sent3: The ironhearted judge sentenced the criminal to the maximum penalty.
meanings.sent4: His ironhearted words cut through her like a sharp blade.
meanings.sent5: The ironhearted wind howled through the night, chilling all who heard it.
